docs.text: as i walked out of crouching tiger , hidden dragon i thought to myself that i had had just seen a great film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: with the passage of a few hours i tempered my enthusiasm and started pondering the question of whether a masterpiece must implicitly be a " great " piece of work and viceversa .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: attempting to make a distinction may be a matter of splitting hairs .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: i avoided a commitment by appealing to etymology .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as the word implies , a masterpiece is any work which embodies the skills of a master .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as such it should suffice to say that it is a product of exceptional quality .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: crouching tiger , hidden dragon fits comfortably in that category .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: crouching tiger , hidden dragon immerses the viewer in an idealized world of oriental folklore , with the requisite blend of legend , fantasy , magic and mythology .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it is reminiscent of a wagnerian epic with characters which might as well be half-gods - greater than life , purer than life , stronger than life , physically invincible and able to accomplish superhuman feats , but with a human soul that makes them ultimately vulnerable .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: all the classic elements of the oriental mystique are thrown into the mix , including the art of contemplation and the concept of martial dexterity as the physical equivalent of spiritual advancement .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the classic struggle between good and evil is the inevitable backdrop , with advanced masters of each and a golden pupil , which must choose between the two .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: it is the gifted pupil who , under the influence of the evil master steals the holy grail in the form of a magic sword which is the focus of the conflict at the heart of the legend .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the elements of romance at two different levels of enlightenment ( a pair of masters and a pair of youngsters ) are poignantly represented .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the paradox of oriental restraint existing side by side with all consuming passion in the same breast is projected effectively .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: the fight scenes are stunning balletic tours-de-force , not to be taken literally but clearly to be enjoyed as superb cinematic art , as are the prodigious leaps and flights to , from and between rooftops , the martial combat at the top of swaying bamboo branches and the combatants skipping like pebbles along the surface of a lake .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there need be no question of suspended disbelief when one is in the presence of poetry .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: as in a wagnerian opera there is a substantial story line , which takes place at an ordinary human level , yet the entire project is to be accepted as a work of art rooted in fantasy .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: do not assume , however , that the art is limp-wristed .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: for those who are put off by the " art " label this film can be confidently recommended as engrossing entertainment at the levels of adventure , action and romance .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: there are no weak performances in this movie .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: michelle yeoh imbues her character with depth , humanity and wisdom .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: chow yon fat projects dignity and purity of heart .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: zhang ziyi is a budding superstar .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: she is radiantly beautiful and totally persuasive in a multifaceted role .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: cheng pei pei as the evil master and chang cheng as the bandit prince acquit themselves admirably .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: kudos to screenwriters james schamus , wang hui ling and tsai kuo jing , choreographer yuen wo-ping , photography director peter pau and music director tan dun , each of which contribute quality components to this extraordinary film .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: ang lee as the director , co-producer and mastermind of the project gets the lion share of the credit .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: this is destined to be one of those films that everybody likes , including those who hate martial arts movies .
docs.label: positive

docs.text: don't miss it .
docs.label: positive
